item.title: Apollo Micro Systems share price jumps 70% in one month. Should you buy this defence stock?

item.title: Current Infraprojects IPO listing: Shares list at a solid premium of 90%, hits upper price band

review.headline_rewrite: Current Infraprojects IPO listing: Shares list at a solid premium of 90%, hits upper price band
bullets: Current Infraprojects IPO listing: Shares of Current Infraprojects made a stellar debut on NSE SME on Wednesday, September 3, listing at a solid premium
Current Infraprojects’ share price opened at ₹152 on the NSE on Wednesday, September 3, compared to its issue price of ₹80.
According to the Red Herring Prospectus (RHP) of the issue, the company specialises in engineering, procurement, and construction (EPC) services, providing comprehensive solutions in
The company's revenue from operations in FY25 was ₹90.88 crore, while profit after tax was ₹9.45 crore.

item.title: ACME Solar secures 50 MW clean energy contract from Tata Power

review.headline_rewrite: ACME Solar secures 50 MW clean energy contract from Tata Power
bullets: The contract, awarded at a tariff of ₹4.43 per unit, was part of a larger 250 MW tender floated by Tata Power-D.
The shares of ACME Solar Holdings Ltd were trading at ₹295.10 up by ₹7.90 or 2.75 per cent on the NSE today at 10.05

item.title: Mixed Debut: Anlon Healthcare & Vikran Engineering list muted; Sattva Engineering, Current Infraprojects shine

review.headline_rewrite: Mixed Debut: Anlon Healthcare & Vikran Engineering list muted; Sattva Engineering, Current Infraprojects shine
bullets: The IPO market on Wednesday witnessed a mixed trend as mainboard IPOs — Anlon Healthcare and Vikran Engineering shares — delivered muted listings, while
Vikran Engineering stock made a modest debut wtih 2-2.8 per cent gains on the NSE and BSE at ₹99 and ₹99.70, respectively.
The company’s ₹772-crore IPO garnered overall subscription of 23.59 times at a price band of ₹92-97 per share.
Shivani Nyati, Head of Wealth at Swastika Investmart, advised investors to hold their holdings with a stop-loss near ₹89 to safeguard against volatility, as
